about_the_game:
Gunswitch is a game that yearns for more! Thousands of monsters, ten thousands of bullets on-screen! Action packed with blood and explosions, mixed with the weight of realistic movement to capture the thrill of a fluidly approaching horde, skittering and slumbering in to get you. Steel yourselves for carnage! Steel won’t bleed, but cut through flesh.

Fight through massive armies, not only strong in numbers but in variety. You’ll come across enemies of all types and kinds, tough and muscular, fast and nimble, multitudes of bugs, giant lava monsters, or smarter humanoid species.

Monsters might decide to stick around with others like packs of wolves, make formations to increase their chances and as waves pass like tides of oceanic hell, they will get stronger.

Do anything to avoid your destruction. Run and herd them or push and knock them around with sheer force of firepower and explosions. This will be a case of natural selection. Hopefully it will be on your side.

Grab guns and upgrade them into sci-fi weapons of total mayhem. With modifications even a regular rifle can fire more projectiles, explosive bullets and have increased fire rate or higher stats all around. When one isn’t enough, get a new one!

Operate pawns, a squad of androids, equip each of them with these weapons, and there’s no limit to synergies and pure damage you might come across. Don’t worry, they will cover you automatically and you can switch between characters at will. They act like extra lives!

A future society of humans-turned-androids are locked in a facility called Cerberus. A space station designed to keep and research galactic level threats. Explore its each level filled with horrible dangers and help them get out.

  • A fluid, dangerous horde of monsters.

  • Guns with wild modifications that can shoot thousands of bullets!

  • Control a squad of androids that can cover you automatically. Or just use them as spare bodies.

  • Switch guns and characters on the spot to adapt, experiment and create new builds.

  • Escape Cerberus, a space prison with many levels and facilities.

  • Easy Local Co-Op, just plug in a controller and play as a squad member, drop in and out.

We are excited to announce our debut game, Gunswitch. We can’t wait to hear the player feedback, and see what kind of new ideas will come out of it. Please add Gunswitch to your Wishlist and Follow us to stay in tune with the development. Thank you!

short_description: GUNSWITCH is a top-down arena shooter: Mow through hordes of demonic aliens. Upgrade your weapons to fire thousands of bullets within seconds. Escape space prison with your robot squad. Switch your loadout on the spot to adapt and become a killing machine.
